card_name: Rilliona, the Wondrous Magistus Witch Wardrobe
card_text: 2 Level 4 Spellcaster monsters with different Attributes$NYou can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Magistus" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Magistus" monsters. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Rilliona, the Wondrous Magistus Witch Wardrobe" once per turn.
